A journal article with the same DOI name is already in the current project.
Do you still want to download the bibliographic information?

A book with the same ISBN is already in the current project.
Do you still want to download the bibliographic information?

OptionsDialogISBNInfo.message: Citavi can detect ISBNs and DOIs on Web pages and highlight them with the Citavi icon. Click the icon to perform an online search for the book or article. To choose the catalogs to search for an ISBN, in Citavi, on the Extras menu, click Options.
